Our Story

Hear how we started out of a garage

Now we run the neighborhood

Zarius had always been an entrepreneur at heart. He loved the idea of creating something from scratch and building it up into a successful venture. After years of working in various industries, he decided to pursue his passion for food and beverages and started a lemonade and tapioca business in the bustling city of Houston, Texas. Zarius had always been a fan of refreshing and flavorful drinks, and he knew that there was a demand for something unique and different in the Houston community.

He spent months researching and experimenting with different flavors and combinations until he found the perfect recipe for his signature lemonade and tapioca drinks. He carefully sourced the freshest ingredients and spent hours cooking and testing until he had perfected each recipe. Zarius was determined to offer his customers a truly memorable experience, one that would leave them craving more.

When he opened his business in Houston, Zarius was overwhelmed by the positive response he received from the community. People loved his drinks and the friendly and welcoming atmosphere of his business. He quickly became known as the go-to spot for refreshing and delicious drinks in the city.

Over time, Zarius continued to innovate and create new flavors and combinations, always striving to offer his customers the very best. He became a fixture in the Houston community, and his business became a beloved local institution.

Today, Zarius is proud of the success he has achieved with his lemonade and tapioca business. He is grateful for the support of his loyal customers and for the opportunity to share his passion for delicious and refreshing drinks with the world.
